course.title: ADM 4322 Marketing Strategy (3 units)
course.desc: This capstone course in marketing provides a hands-on experience to students in developing a marketing strategy in a competitive environment. Students are expected to work in groups on marketing projects sponsored by companies. This project-oriented course uses case studies and/or marketing simulation, in addition to regular lectures.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: ADM 2381, ADM 3321. Course reserved for students: in a B.Com. who completed at least 33 units from ADM core courses, including ADM 2381; in minors or in certificate programs when the course is required.
